description: The requirement is for the supply, and delivery of a microscope with Transmission Electron Microscope (TEM) and Scanning Transmission Electron Microscope (STEM) capabilities, and including an additional camera, other associated accessories and a perpetual license for the operations software to the National Centre for Foreign Animal Diseases (NCFAD) located in Winnipeg Manitoba. The requirement includes installation of and training on the TEM/STEM as well as a two year maintenance and support service period.

# Government Tender Announcement

## General Information

* Reference Number: WS4328933184-Doc4328969555
* Solicitation Number: WS4328933184
* Date of Publication: December 21, 2023
* Closing Date and Time: January 31, 2024 14:00:00 hours EST
* Amendment Number: 2
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 31, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

## Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of a Transmission Electron Microscope (TEM) and Scanning Transmission Electron Microscope (STEM).

### Key Requirements

* Supply and delivery of a microscope with TEM and STEM capabilities
* Additional camera and associated accessories
* Perpetual license for the operations software
* Installation and training for the TEM/STEM
* Two-year maintenance and support service period

### Tender Conditions

* The RFP is open to both Canadian and international bidders
* The low bid will be the preferred bidder
* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by January 31, 2024, at 14:00:00 hours EST
* Bids submitted after the closing time will be declared non-responsive

### Contact Information

* Diane Warnell (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: N/A
* Fax: N/A

### Notice URL

* [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18346962?extsite=MTgzNDY5NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18346962?extsite=MTgzNDY5NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

All tender inquiries and requests for clarification should be directed to the contact person above. The Government of Canada strives to promote fairness, transparency, and equal access in the tendering process. We urges all interested bidders to carefully review the RFP documentation prior to submitting a bid.
